p: Thalli of three lichen species were dried and ground into a fine powder. The powder was extracted by maceration (24 h) using acetone at ambient temperature [ 13]. Extracts of species were filtered then concentrated at 40°C under reduced pressure. The extraction yield obtained 4.52%, 1.32%, and 4.32% for P. furfuracea, R. farinacea, and E. prunastri extracts, respectively. The extracts obtained were kept at −20°C until further analysis.
